name: Huge Monster Traffic
description: Huge Monster Traffic is a free 4x4 mad truck city driving adventure launched in 2017, which allows you to drag your monster truck or my monster mayhem with a simulation of real rush thrill. So fans of city car driving, mad monster truck fury or city driving games; buckle up, tap accelerate, unleash your game spirit and show your unmatchable driving skills with my monster mayhem, gravedigger monster truck or any other mad trucks.  Get behind the steering of your 4x4 monster truck and drive mad truck in fury through city roads but bear in mind, if you want to be the best monster truck racer than don’t forget to collect trophies. You have to collect trophies as well to complete the city car driving games level and master this mad monster truck city drive.
